text: Clavaleyres was a municipality in Bern-Mittelland in the canton of Bern in Switzerland. On 1 January 2022, it was merged with Murten in the canton of Fribourg. ==Gallery== File:2012-04-26 Sense-Sarino (Foto Dietrich Michael Weidmann) 421.JPG|Village entry of Clavaleyres File:2012-04-26 Sense-Sarino (Foto Dietrich Michael Weidmann) 432.JPG|Clavaleyres ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website Category:Former municipalities in Bern- Mittelland
title: Clavaleyres
